text: Phyllis Smith (born July 10, 1951) is an American actress. She is best known for playing Phyllis Lapin-Vance in The Office and her voice role as Sadness in the Disney/Pixar movie Inside Out. ==Other websites== * * Cast Bio on NBC web site * Phyllis Smith at TV.com Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Phyllis Smith
